title: (x) 09 soft tech sans - Platelet {Yves}
content:
I know it’s not much to go on, but I’m hoping someone can ID this font.  
Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009203317im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/09_5624.jpg)

 [‹ Kill Bill Typography (revisited)](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009203317/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50177 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Jagger" peculiar wide sans - Aspect {Akira} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009203317/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50333 "Go to next forum topic")
author: juano

comments.content: Enough for me apparently. That’s [Conor Mangat](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009203317/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Conor%252BMangat)’s slightly brilliant [Platelet](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009203317/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/emigre/platelet/).
Thank you very much. Platelet was about the only font I didn’t try in my never ending search. I should have come here first. Next time I will.
